requirements.summary: Increase the displayed size of the hero logo image by updating only its Tailwind height classes in App.tsx.
acceptanceCriteria: Only the hero logo (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) changes; no other elementsâ€™ code or styling is modified.
The logo renders visibly larger than before at both mobile and md+ breakpoints (i.e., its Tailwind height classes are increased from the current values).
The logo image source path and alt text remain unchanged, and the hero overlay content (headings, buttons, gradient overlay, slider behavior) remains unchanged.

file_operations.description: Locate the hero logo element (currently using Tailwind classes "h-16 md:h-20 mx-auto mb-6") and increase only its Tailwind height sizing classes for mobile and md+ (e.g., bump to larger h-* values). Do not change src, alt, container structure, margins, or any other elements/styles.
